tldr: Out-of-bounds write in `Dawn` in Google Chrome prior to 130.0.6723.92 allows a remote attacker to perform out-of-bounds memory access via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Critical)
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `electron` library to a patch version.
